column1: Today I asked Congress to stand for a moment of silence to acknowledge the disenfranchisement of 63 million voters who voted for our president and to #MAGA. Leftists on Twitter whined about it.   They think impeachment helps them. I say — WRONG!  https://t.co/P1S0XDYMHY https://t.co/O7DZR6Je1I

On Nov. 10 the Cowboys-Vikings game had 23M viewers on NBC. Compare that to the largest TV audience so far for one of the #shamimpeachment hearings-13M on all networks combined.   Americans are seeing through this charade they are tuning it out and they are tired of it.

Wow! What an event last night in Mahoning Co. I was so pleased to be joined by my colleague @DevinNunes  He’s doing a great job - and I know the people there last night at the sold out event agree! https://t.co/T0Jx8y03IA
God Bless all of our veterans and their families on this very special Veterans Day! #VetransDay2019

Planned Parenthood is back at it planning to spend $45 million in this upcoming election cycle. That's a lot of money to invest to further their business model of taking the lives of unborn children and demanding that taxpayers foot the bill.  Sick! https://t.co/cRkJnQ27mx
Thank you all ! https://t.co/Nd50TUy7SI
Great weather today for the Lisbon Johnny Appleseed Festival and Jackson Apple parades. Big thank you to all my volunteers! https://t.co/HKv0lPf7QC
Hope everyone had a great time this weekend at the #sternwheeler Festival in Marietta. Always such a fun weekend. https://t.co/qhNyOJjSJQ
Great crowd tonight in Columbiana for the Street Fair Parade. Nice to see everyone and thank you to my volunteers! https://t.co/YpsxiqLgD3

Great to go to the @CanfieldFair today. Largest county fair in the state. Of course picked up cinnamon rolls from Molnar’s. Saw a lot of people including @GovMikeDeWine #SixBestDaysofSummer https://t.co/Xiptnnq17J
Monroe County Fair last night! https://t.co/Qk0cOceYoW

The 2020 #Democrats will stop at nothing to eliminate jobs they don't approve of. Not only would thousands of American men and women be put out of work electricity prices would soar under their plans to eliminate fossil fuels. Full op-ed in the @IntelligencerWV
Waterford Community Fair Parade. A lot of small town pride ! https://t.co/J1221SszVc
Scio Fall Fest! https://t.co/5xKMrYBnUv

Great time today at the Cuyahoga County GOP Picnic. A large motivated and optimistic group! https://t.co/zeJhq58ute
Made a new friend this afternoon at the Harrison County Fair. https://t.co/jvPd1V0piP

Everything about this statement by Senator Gillibrand is disturbing...and wrong. She said referring to those who are pro-life: “we have as a society decided that the other side (pro-life) is not acceptable.”  We did? https://t.co/GLUJUYTxeP

NBC News is compiling a list to see where each Member of Congress stands on impeachment. A local affiliate reached out to me for my position: My answer is straight to the point.   https://t.co/VhpSGETkDD
Scioto County Republican Club Pie and Sweet Tooth Auction held last night. Heard there were quite a few good choices! https://t.co/PNA3qdYl6w
Glad to be a hole sponsor for the Mahoning Chapter of the Daughters of the American Revolution All-American Golf Classic! Great organization! @TodaysDAR https://t.co/wjN4jZBCrg

Wow what a wonderful evening at the Ohio Christian Alliance Spring Freedom Banquet. Great turnout in support of the effort to install FDR’s WWII Prayer at the WWII Memorial. @ohiochristianal https://t.co/c5HRqtun1N

We've seen this before: rich Hollywood types telling us that we should pay even more in taxes while they're able to pay accountants so their tax liability is as low as possible.  Their hypocrisy is disgusting.   https://t.co/hbbbAN6QGx
Great enthusiastic crowd at tonight’s Jackson County Lincoln Day Dinner. With some local Young Republicans! Thanks to all who attended. https://t.co/g53Fmh9kDp

It's now official - no collusion and no obstruction.  I found the questions and attitude of most of the MSM reporters at AG Barr's press conf to be disgraceful. You could see them getting upset and frustrated as their dreams of the previous 2+ years were going up in smoke.

I'm thrilled that Gov. @MikeDeWine signed the #HeartbeatBill into law - and that he kept his campaign promise to do so. Thank you to all of the Ohio lawmakers and pro-life advocates who took a stand to protect the unborn especially children with beating hearts.
Yes there are Republicans in Athens County! @OUCRs at Athens Lincoln Day Dinner. https://t.co/Ndu4MbDpR3
Ohio Valley Friends of NRA Dinner tonight in Bethesda ! https://t.co/dnMCRaojeS
Largest crowd ever recorded at the Scioto County Lincoln Day Dinner - wow! https://t.co/JjHUen9F91

I will sign this petition. Republicans have tried - 20 times - to vote on the Born Alive bill and 20 times House Democrats have blocked it. The American people deserve to know where their elected representatives stand on this life and death issue. https://t.co/NaSPLRwQVl
Welcome to Ohio @realDonaldTrump !

Hustled home from votes in Washington to get to the annual Lincoln Day Dinner in Meigs Co. It's always an enthusiastic crowd and tonight was no different. I heard over and over again from folks to keep supporting @realDonaldTrump and his agenda!
May 2011 President Obama: "We just can't drill our way out of the problem."  Well it turns out not only that we can but that we have. https://t.co/aaTtZ1QHAR
